p:
We used simulated annealing
22 to choose an optimal A that minimize NN(A). First we initially random guess some A. Then we randomly change one sample’s label obtain A′, and test if it improves the nuclear norm. If Uniform(0, 1) < exp((NN-NN’)/T) then A = A′, where T is the annealing parameter. The algorithm is shown in Table 1.
